alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 8:31PM MST until August 10 at 10:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PINAL COUNTY... At 831 PM MST, Doppler radar is showing another round of showers and thunderstorms moving into the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is likely ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Pinal County This includes the following Flash Flood Prone Locations... Suizo Rd at Cadillac Wash and Park Link Dr between I-10 and HWY 79. This includes the following streams and drainages... Guild Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
